verses.verse: Now the Philistines <WH6430> gathered together <WH6908> all their armies <WH4264> to Aphek: <WH663> and the Israelites <WH3478> encamped <WH2583> by the spring <WH5869> which is in Jezreel. <WH3157>

The lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> passed on <WH5674> by hundreds, <WH3967> and by thousands; <WH505> and David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> passed on <WH5674> in the rear <WH314> with Achish. <WH397>

Then the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> said, <WH559> "What about these Hebrews? <WH5680>" Achish <WH397> said <WH559> to the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines, <WH6430> "Isn't <WH1732> this David, the servant <WH5650> of Saul <WH7586> the king <WH4428> of Israel, <WH3478> who has been with me these days, <WH3117> or rather these years, <WH8141> and I have found <WH4672> no fault <WH3972> in him since <WH3117> he fell <WH5307> away to this day? <WH3117>"

But the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> were angry <WH7107> with him; <WH8269> and the princes of the Philistines <WH6430> said <WH559> to him, <WH7725> "Make the man <WH376> return, <WH7725> that he may go back <WH7725> to his place <WH4725> where you have appointed <WH6485> him, <WH3381> and let him not go down with us to battle, <WH4421> lest in the battle <WH4421> he become an adversary <WH7854> to us. <WH7521> For with what should this fellow reconcile himself to his lord? <WH113> Should it not be with the heads <WH7218> of these men? <WH582>

Is not this David, <WH1732> of whom they sang <WH6030> one to another in dances, <WH4246> saying, <WH559> <WH7586> 'Saul has slain <WH5221> his thousands, <WH505> David <WH1732> his ten thousands? <WH7233>'"

Then Achish <WH397> called <WH7121> David, <WH1732> and said <WH559> to him, <WH3068> "As Yahweh lives, <WH2416> you have been upright, <WH3477> and your going out <WH3318> and your coming in <WH935> with me in the army <WH4264> is good <WH2896> in my sight; <WH5869> for I have not found <WH4672> evil <WH7451> in you since the day <WH3117> of your coming <WH935> to me to this day. <WH3117> Nevertheless, <WH5633> the lords don't <WH5869> favor you. <WH2896>
Therefore now return, <WH7725> and go <WH3212> in peace, <WH7965> that you not displease <WH7451> the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines. <WH6430>"

David <WH1732> said <WH559> to Achish, <WH397> "But what have I done? <WH6213> What have you found <WH4672> in your servant <WH5650> so long as <WH3117> I have been before you <WH6440> to this day, <WH3117> that I may not go <WH935> and fight <WH3898> against the enemies <WH341> of my lord <WH113> the king? <WH4428>"

Achish <WH397> answered <WH6030> David, <WH1732> "I know <WH3045> that you are good <WH2896> in my sight, <WH5869> as an angel <WH4397> of God. <WH430> Notwithstanding the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> have said, <WH559> <WH5927> 'He shall not go up with us to the battle. <WH4421>'

Therefore now rise up early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242> with the servants <WH5650> of your lord <WH113> who have come <WH935> with you; <WH7925> and as soon as you are up early in the morning, <WH1242> and have light, <WH215> depart. <WH3212>"

So David <WH1732> rose up early, <WH7925> he and his men, <WH582> to depart <WH3212> in the morning, <WH1242> to return <WH7725> into the land <WH776> of the Philistines. <WH6430> The Philistines <WH6430> went up <WH5927> to Jezreel. <WH3157>
